Miscellaneous Highlights: Pascal Siakam scored 26 points, Thomas Bryant added a season-high 22, and two-time All-Star Tyrese Haliburton had 16 points and 13 assists in the Indiana Pacers' 129-113 victory over the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday night
Others: The Pacers won their fourth straight game, all by 10 or more points, and their 10th win in 13 games, helping them climb the Eastern Conference standings
